answers.answer: Altho fainting is common in pregnancy you could still go in to be checked out. Make sure everything thing else is ok.
^^ Agreed .. If you have to wait I would call your doctor also.
Get checked. Could be gestational diabetes,  low iron, or many other things. Better safe than sorry.

I fainted before i knew i was pregnant. So glad i didnt get hurt cause i was in the shower while i fainted hit mybhead hard enough to crack the tile on the floor. I didnt eat or drink anything that day, i think thats why. Make sure to stay hydrated!

question: Hey ladys im 10wks2daysAbout 30 mins ago i was at a neighbors and i fainted i didnt hurt myself on the way down since i was sitting down leaning again the chest of ny friend but i did collapse...when i was able to get back up i drank a cup of coke and am feeling betterI live in tijuana mexico and my husband is off work til 6 he works on the other side of the borderIs it nesassasary to cross since to go get cheaked out at the er or is this common??I am a US resident i was born in the USA so its just waiting in line that's a painPlease help
title: i just fainted :O
